apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a man with a dark skin tone kissing a woman, also with a dark skin tone, in a moment of intimate affection. The design features Apple's hallmark soft rounded edges and glossy 3D shading, giving the figures a tactile and warm appearance. Their closed eyes and the gentle tilt of their heads communicate love, romance, and a deep emotional bond, perfect for expressing heartfelt sentiments on Apple devices.
